dialogues.dialogue: Nobita! You need to work harder instead of relying on my gadgets!
dialogues.context: Doraemon scolding Nobita for using a gadget to avoid studying.

dialogues.dialogue: But Doraemon, I just wanted to take a short nap!
dialogues.context: Nobita trying to justify his laziness after skipping homework.

dialogues.dialogue: Nobita, you should try to be more responsible.
dialogues.context: Shizuka advising Nobita after he fails another test.

dialogues.dialogue: You better listen to my concert, or else!
dialogues.context: Gian forcing his friends to listen to his terrible singing.

dialogues.dialogue: Look at this cool new toy my parents bought me!
dialogues.context: Suneo showing off his wealth to Nobita and friends.

dialogues.dialogue: Doraemon, why do you always get into trouble?
dialogues.context: Dorami scolding Doraemon for making a mess with his gadgets.

dialogues.dialogue: One day, I will become a famous manga artist!
dialogues.context: Jaiko expressing her dreams of becoming a manga artist.

dialogues.dialogue: Nobita, studying can be fun if you find the right approach.
dialogues.context: Dekisugi encouraging Nobita to take his studies seriously.

dialogues.dialogue: Nobita! No playing until you finish your homework!
dialogues.context: Nobita's mother setting strict study rules for him.

dialogues.dialogue: When I was your age, I had to work very hard.
dialogues.context: Nobita's dad reminiscing about his childhood to teach Nobita a lesson.
